Class ClientConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.ClientConfig

  • public class ClientConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Reti e Laboratorio III - A.A. 2022/2023

    Progetto finale

    La classe ClientConfig rappresenta la configurazione del client.
    Author:
    Alessia Anile
